name: Free Online Random Password Generator - ATools
description: Free online random password generator: configure length, character sets, excluded characters, and quantity. Saves generated passwords to local history (password + time).
seoDescription: The ultimate free online Random Password Generator — ATools (Pure Tools). Generate cryptographically secure passwords locally in your browser (Web Crypto), with configurable length, quantity, character sets (lower/upper/digits/symbols), and excluded characters. Results are easy to copy, and generated passwords are automatically saved to localStorage with timestamps for convenient history review. No uploads, no tracking — everything runs locally for privacy.
